Paragraph: As compared to the solution state , the absorption onsets in the solid state are extended to 770 nm while the vibronic shoulders become stronger , indicating that both polymer chains exhibit a strong tendency to selfassemble in the solid state , which may induce crystallization.

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "vibronic shoulders" - This entity refers to a phenomenon related to the absorption of light, but it is not a material name.
* "solution state" - This entity refers to a state of a substance, but it is not a material name.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
